# drawingRect(forBounds:)

**Instance Method**

Returns the rectangle within which the receiver draws itself

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func drawingRect(forBounds rect: NSRect) -> NSRect
```

## Parameters

- **rect**: The bounding rectangle of the receiver.

## Return Value

The rectangle in which the receiver draws itself. This rectangle is slightly inset from the one in `theRect`.

## Related Documentation

- **calcSize()**: Recomputes any internal sizing information for the receiver, if necessary.

## Determining Cell Size

- **calcDrawInfo(_:)**: Recalculates the cell geometry.
- **cellSize**: The minimum size needed to display the cell.
- **cellSize(forBounds:)**: Returns the minimum size needed to display the receiver, constraining it to the specified rectangle.
- **imageRect(forBounds:)**: Returns the rectangle in which the receiver draws its image.
- **titleRect(forBounds:)**: Returns the rectangle in which the receiver draws its title text.
- **controlSize**: The size of the cell.
